values:
My baby is sick. No kissy kissy for Bertie. Siiiiiiigh. But I get all the cuddles I want!!!! :)

Hmm ... I plan on visiting the ways later tonight. Gonna get some stuff situated here first, then I'm OFF!! Haha.

I don't really know what else to say. Poo. I hope everyone's having an awesome day!
I'm feeling well rested now. Haha, it took me forever and a day, but oh well. All that matters is that I'm not gonna be some sort of troll that hides away from everyone anymore. Hmmm ....
